#FAQ
Q: How many sessions can I save?
A: There's no fixed limit - save as many sessions as you need. The extension is optimized for handling numerous sessions efficiently.
Q: Will this slow down my browser?
A: No, Chrome Tab Saver is designed to be lightweight and efficient, with minimal impact on browser performance.
Q: Is my data secure?
A: Yes, all your data is stored locally on your device. We don't collect or transmit any personal information.
Q: Do I need to create an account?
A: No! Just install and start using - no accounts, no signup, no complexity.
Q: How is this different from bookmarks?
A: Unlike bookmarks, Chrome Tab Saver saves the complete state of your tabs, allowing you to pick up exactly where you left off with one click.
Q: Is it difficult to use?
A: Not at all! Just click to save your tabs, click again to restore them. It's that simple.
Start saving your tabs the easy way - Install now!
